fishes.title: Ionic is best best in making hybrid apps
fishes.descrption: Cards are a standard piece of UI that serves as an entry point to more detailed information. A card can be a single component, but is often made up of some header, title, subtitle, and content. ion-card is broken up into several sub-components to reflect this
